system.description: At 14th level, you can condemn a creature to see Hell in all its infernal glory. When you hit a creature with an attack, you can use this feature to instantly fling it through the most horrific vistas of the multiverse. The creature disappears  until the end of your next turn, reppearing in the space it previously occupied, or the nearest unoccupied space. If the creature is not a fiend, it takes [[/r 10d10]] psychic, fire, or cold damage (your choice). Once you have used this feature, you canâ€™t do so again until you finish  long rest.
